message: All of this has already happened.
Forcing myself to ignore the guilt, I close my eyes and turn my back on the voices.
As I press on against the scorching heat, I hear a sound from up ahead.

...A beating heart?<k>
Or the roar of waves?
The gentle sound echoes through the area, slowly overtaking the pandemonium around me.
The heat even seems to fade a little, though perhaps I only imagine it.
Whatever the case, it gives me the strength to keep going.
I walk on, searching for Mink.
